text: Trumpism is a right-wing political movement based on the ideology of United States president Donald Trump, a very active member of the Republican Party. The Trumpist faction of the Republican Party, the Freedom Caucus, is now the largest faction in the federal Republican Party. Trumpism is a right-wing ideology that is heavily influenced by national conservatism,https://scholarship.claremont.edu/cmc_theses/2973/ right-wing populismhttps://www.gisreportsonline.com/r/national-conservatism/ and social conservatism.https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2017/04/04/trump-administration- cuts-funding-un-population-fund-concerns/http://fortune.com/2017/03/13/mark- cuban-president-trump- sxsw/http://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2017/04/26/donald-trump-social- conservatives-215073 It has also been described as Americanist,https://www.cbsnews.com/news/donald-trump-gop-convention-speech/ Christian rightist,https://www.newyorker.com/news/the-political-scene/how- trump-captured-iowas-religious- righthttps://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2023/09/12/republicans-church- trump-00113565 illiberal, isolationist,https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trumps-rise-sparks-isolationist- worries-among-us-allies-americans-focus-home-2024-01-17/ libertarian,https://web.archive.org/web/20151231034812/http://www.ontheissues.org/Donald_Trump.htm nationalist,https://www.nytimes.com/2017/04/21/world/europe/france-election- trump-marine-le- pen.html?mcubz=1https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/world/2017/07/03/trump- abroad-u-s-president-goes-poland-before-g-20-summit/447412001/ protectionist,https://www.newyorker.com/news/john-cassidy/donald-trump-is- transforming-the-g-o-p-into-a-populist-nativist- partyhttp://www.realclearpolitics.com/articles/2015/08/26/donald_trump_a_21st_century_protectionist_herbert_hoover_127893.html and semi-authoritarian.https://www.npr.org/2021/05/13/996617553/the-u-s-is- headed-away-from-the-ideals-of-democracy-says-author-masha- gessenhttps://eprints.whiterose.ac.uk/190496/3/10564926221119395.pdf ==Similar ideologies overseas== Many foreign right-wing politicians have been described as their country's version of Trump or who have been major allies of Trump. These include Argentina's Javier Milei,https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-news/javier-milei-guide- argentina-trump-loving-
